snippet: The aluminum company Alcoa posted revenue that topped expectations, and Chinese imports of copper helped buoy the rest of the sector.
abstract: Stock indexes climb to a five-month high, led by bank shares and materials stocks after an upbeat forecast by Alcoa.
lead_paragraph: The aluminum company Alcoa posted revenue that topped expectations, and Chinese imports of copper helped buoy the rest of the sector.

headline.seo: Materials Companies Lift Indexes to 5-Month High
headline.main: Materials Companies Lift Indexes to 5-Month High
headline.print_headline: Materials Companies Lift Indexes to 5-Month High
